message.name: ERR_SAE_FV_AMOUNT_INVALID
message.locale: An expense amount must be entered.

message.name: ERR_SAE_FV_FREQUENCY_EMPTY
message.locale: An expense frequency must be specified.

message.name: ERR_SAE_FV_START_DATE_NULL
message.locale: The start date must be entered.

message.name: ERR_SAE_FV_END_DATE_NULL
message.locale: The end date must be entered.

message.name: ERR_SAE_XFV_END_DATE_BEFORE_START_DATE
message.locale: The end date must not be earlier than the start date.

message.name: ERR_SAE_FV_EXPENSE_TYPE_EMPTY
message.locale: The sporting expense type must be specified.

message.name: ERR_SAE_XFV_START_DATE_BEFORE_PARENT_START_DATE
message.locale: The Sporting Activity Expense start date must not be earlier than the Sporting Activity start date.

message.name: ERR_SAE_XFV_END_DATE_AFTER_PARENT_END_DATE
message.locale: The Sporting Activity Expense end date must not be later than the Sporting Activity end date.
